pkgmetadata.longdescription: Accessing New York City Taxi Data // New York City's Taxi and Limousine Commission (TLC) Trip Data http://www.nyc.gov/html/tlc/html/about/trip_record_data.shtml is a collection of green and yellow taxi trip data. The data was collected and provided by technology providers under the Taxicab Livery Passenger Enhancement Programs http://www.nyc.gov/html/tlc/html/industry/shl.shtml. This package helps users to download New York City Trip Data.
